languages.text: This blade can only perform area attacks. Attacks of opportunity performed with it are also area attacks.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] This blade have only Area of Effect attack. Attacks of Opportunity are Area of Effect too.
This blade can only perform area attacks. Attacks of opportunity performed with it are also area attacks.
This blade can only perform area attacks. Attacks of opportunity performed with it are also area attacks.
This blade can only perform area attacks. Attacks of opportunity performed with it are also area attacks.

languages.text: Esta hoja solo puede lanzar ataques de área. Los ataques de oportunidad que lanza también son ataques de área.
languages.original_text: This blade can only perform area attacks. Attacks of opportunity performed with it are also area attacks.

traits.locale_text: Esta hoja solo puede lanzar ataques de área. Los ataques de oportunidad que lanza también son ataques de área.

languages.text: このブレードは範囲攻撃しかできない。これで行われる機会攻撃も範囲攻撃である。
languages.original_text: This blade can only perform area attacks. Attacks of opportunity performed with it are also area attacks.

traits.locale_text: このブレードは範囲攻撃しかできない。これで行われる機会攻撃も範囲攻撃である。

languages.text: 这把利刃只能进行范围攻击，发动的借机攻击也都是范围攻击。
languages.original_text: This blade can only perform area attacks. Attacks of opportunity performed with it are also area attacks.

traits.locale_text: 这把利刃只能进行范围攻击，发动的借机攻击也都是范围攻击。

languages.text: Mit dieser Klinge sind nur Flächenangriffe möglich. Damit ausgeführte Gelegenheitsangriffe sind ebenfalls Flächenangriffe.
languages.original_text: This blade can only perform area attacks. Attacks of opportunity performed with it are also area attacks.

traits.locale_text: Mit dieser Klinge sind nur Flächenangriffe möglich. Damit ausgeführte Gelegenheitsangriffe sind ebenfalls Flächenangriffe.

languages.text: Cette lame ne peut effectuer que des attaques de zone. Ses attaques d'opportunité sont également des attaques de zone.
languages.original_text: This blade can only perform area attacks. Attacks of opportunity performed with it are also area attacks.

traits.locale_text: Cette lame ne peut effectuer que des attaques de zone. Ses attaques d'opportunité sont également des attaques de zone.

languages.text: Это оружие наносит только атаки по области. Совершенные им атаки по возможности также являются атаками по области.
languages.original_text: This blade can only perform area attacks. Attacks of opportunity performed with it are also area attacks.

traits.locale_text: Это оружие наносит только атаки по области. Совершенные им атаки по возможности также являются атаками по области.
Это оружие наносит только атаки по области. Совершенные им атаки по возможности также являются атаками по области.

languages.text: Bu pala, yalnızca alan saldırıları gerçekleştirebilir. Onunla yapılan fırsat saldırıları da yine alan saldırısı şeklinde olur.
languages.original_text: This blade can only perform area attacks. Attacks of opportunity performed with it are also area attacks.
